thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 4 of 141
thread.title: Sara

author: Sara
title: Sara
text:
These labels are amazing! I have 3 school aged children who misplace and lose items between school and home. September 2015 my daughter started kindergarten, I Mabel labelled her water bottle. It is washed, bumped around worn out now. However, the label looks like it did the day I affixed it.
It is so nice to use a prudent that is well made and actually lasts!
Highly recommend this to anyone.
